Package br.com.concepting.framework.resources

Class XmlResourcesLoader<R extends BaseResources<XmlNode>>

java.lang.Object
br.com.concepting.framework.resources.BaseResourcesLoader<XmlNode>
br.com.concepting.framework.resources.XmlResourcesLoader<R>
Type Parameters:
R - Class that defines the resources.
Direct Known Subclasses:
AuditorResourcesLoader, FactoryResourcesLoader, NetworkResourcesLoader, PersistenceResourcesLoader, SecurityResourcesLoader, SystemResourcesLoader
public abstract class XmlResourcesLoader<R extends BaseResources<XmlNode>> extends BaseResourcesLoader<XmlNode>
Class that defines the basic implementation to manipulate resources in XML format.
Since:
